Perform Giotto Workflow of Normalization, HVG, Dimension Reduction and Clustering

doGiottoWorkflow.Rd

Perform Giotto Workflow of Normalization, HVG, Dimension Reduction and Clustering

Usage

doGiottoWorkflow(
  obj,
  calculateHVG = TRUE,
  dim_method = "pca",
  cluster_method = "leiden",
  show_plot = FALSE,
  return_plot = FALSE,
  save_plot = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

obj

Giotto Object

calculateHVG

Wheter to calculate HVG

dim_method

dimension reduction method to use: pca, tsne, umap

cluster_method

cluster method to use c(leiden, kmeans, hclust, louvain)

show_plot

show plot

return_plot

return plot

save_plot

save plot

...

additional parameters
